item.title: TransportVehicle
item.author: aaron-zzz@outlook.com (Aaron)
item.description: PID tuning Here I didn’t use the Matlab PID tuning tool, but if we can measure the system parameter precisely and model the system in Simulink, this tool is highly recommended. So I just give it a desired velocity pair(linear velocity and angular velocity), and return the actual velocity (in 1000ms) measured by encoders to see how this close PID loop reacts to this traget value. Then I adjust the parameters basicly according to experience.
